basics.name: Md. Atikuzzaman
basics.label: Lecturer & Researcher
basics.summary: Lecturer at Green University of Bangladesh and AI researcher specializing in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Medical Imaging.

work.name: Green University of Bangladesh
work.position: Lecturer, Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering
work.summary: Teaching and mentoring students in Computer Science and AI-related subjects, conducting research in machine learning and computer vision.

work.name: Kyung Hee University, Republic of Korea
work.position: Research Assistant, Machine Learning & Visual Computing Laboratory
work.summary: Conducted research in AI, focusing on deep learning and computer vision applications.

work.name: Catalyst Solutions (DBA - Adiva Graphics), Bangladesh
work.summary: Worked on data visualization and analytics.

Thesis: Enhanced Urban Cellular Traffic Prediction using Feature Modulation in Densely Connected Convolutional Networks
Vehicle Number Plate Detection and Categorization Using CNNs
